```{r, warning=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(Biostrings)
library(pheatmap)
```

```{r}
submat <-matrix(-1, nrow = 26, ncol = 26, dimnames = list(letters, letters))
diag(submat) <- 0
psa <- pwalign::pairwiseAlignment(pattern = c("succeed", "precede"), subject = "supersede",
substitutionMatrix = submat,
gapOpening = 0, gapExtension = -1)
```



```{r}
dna_sequences <- DNAStringSet(c("AGCTGATCGAGCGCCATCG", "AGCTGATCGAGCTGGCTTGCCATCG", "AGCTGATCGAGTCGACTTGCCATCG"))
reference <- DNAStringSet(c("AGCTGATCGAGCTTGCCATCG"))
psa <- pwalign::pairwiseAlignment(pattern = dna_sequences, subject = reference,
gapOpening = 0, gapExtension = -1)
plot_single_subject_alignments(psa)
```
